014
015package org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.fields;
016
017import static org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions.DefinitionHelper.numberDefinition;
018import static org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions.DefinitionHelper.setFieldNumber;
019import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertEquals;
020
021import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.ValueProvider.PropertyBackedValueAdapter;
022import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions.NumberDefinition;
023import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.fields.NumberField;
024
025import java.util.Properties;
026
027import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
028
029
030public class TestNumberField {
031
032    @Test
033    public void testSimple() {
034        final NumberDefinition f1 = numberDefinition("hello");
035        setFieldNumber(f1, 0);
036        f1.check();
037
038        final Properties props = new Properties();
039        props.setProperty("hello", "100");
040        final NumberField nf1 = NumberField.forTesting(f1, new PropertyBackedValueAdapter(props, f1.getId()));
041        assertEquals(100L, nf1.getNumberValue().longValue());
042    }
043
044    @Test
045    public void testThreeElements() {
046        final NumberDefinition f1 = numberDefinition("hello");
047        setFieldNumber(f1, 0);
048        final NumberDefinition f2 = numberDefinition("hello");
049        setFieldNumber(f2, 1);
050        final NumberDefinition f3 = numberDefinition("hello");
051        setFieldNumber(f3, 2);
052        f1.check();
053        f2.check();
054        f3.check();
055
056        final String value = "4.8.15";
057
058        final Properties props = new Properties();
059        props.setProperty("hello", value);
060
061        final NumberField nf1 = NumberField.forTesting(f1, new PropertyBackedValueAdapter(props, f1.getId()));
062        final NumberField nf2 = NumberField.forTesting(f2, new PropertyBackedValueAdapter(props, f2.getId()));
063        final NumberField nf3 = NumberField.forTesting(f3, new PropertyBackedValueAdapter(props, f3.getId()));
064        assertEquals(4L, nf1.getNumberValue().longValue());
065        assertEquals(8L, nf2.getNumberValue().longValue());
066        assertEquals(15L, nf3.getNumberValue().longValue());
067
068        assertEquals(value, nf1.getValue());
069        assertEquals(value, nf2.getValue());
070        assertEquals(value, nf3.getValue());
071    }
072
073    @Test
074    public void testItsComplicated() {
075        final NumberDefinition f1 = numberDefinition("hello");
076        setFieldNumber(f1, 0);
077        final NumberDefinition f2 = numberDefinition("hello");
078        setFieldNumber(f2, 1);
079        final NumberDefinition f3 = numberDefinition("hello");
080        setFieldNumber(f3, 2);
081        final NumberDefinition f4 = numberDefinition("hello");
082        setFieldNumber(f4, 3);
083        f1.check();
084        f2.check();
085        f3.check();
086        f4.check();
087
088        final String value = "3.2-alpha-1-test-4";
089
090        final Properties props = new Properties();
091        props.setProperty("hello", value);
092
093        final NumberField nf1 = NumberField.forTesting(f1, new PropertyBackedValueAdapter(props, f1.getId()));
094        final NumberField nf2 = NumberField.forTesting(f2, new PropertyBackedValueAdapter(props, f2.getId()));
095        final NumberField nf3 = NumberField.forTesting(f3, new PropertyBackedValueAdapter(props, f3.getId()));
096        final NumberField nf4 = NumberField.forTesting(f4, new PropertyBackedValueAdapter(props, f4.getId()));
097
098        assertEquals(3L, nf1.getNumberValue().longValue());
099        assertEquals(2L, nf2.getNumberValue().longValue());
100        assertEquals(1L, nf3.getNumberValue().longValue());
101        assertEquals(4L, nf4.getNumberValue().longValue());
102
103        assertEquals(value, nf1.getValue());
104        assertEquals(value, nf2.getValue());
105        assertEquals(value, nf3.getValue());
106        assertEquals(value, nf4.getValue());
107    }
108
109    @Test
110    public void testIncrementSingle() {
111        final NumberDefinition f1 = numberDefinition("hello");
112        setFieldNumber(f1, 0);
113
114        final String value = "foobar-1.2-barfoo-3";
115
116        final Properties props = new Properties();
117        props.setProperty("hello", value);
118
119        final NumberField nf1 = NumberField.forTesting(f1, new PropertyBackedValueAdapter(props, f1.getId()));
120
121        assertEquals(1L, nf1.getNumberValue().longValue());
122        assertEquals(value, nf1.getValue());
123
124        nf1.increment();
125
126        assertEquals(2L, nf1.getNumberValue().longValue());
127        assertEquals("foobar-2.2-barfoo-3", nf1.getValue());
128    }
129
130    @Test
131    public void testIncrement2() {
132        final NumberDefinition f1 = numberDefinition("hello");
133        setFieldNumber(f1, 0);
134        final NumberDefinition f2 = numberDefinition("hello");
135        setFieldNumber(f2, 1);
136        f1.check();
137        f2.check();
138
139        final String value = "4.8";
140
141        final Properties props = new Properties();
142        props.setProperty("hello", value);
143
144        final NumberField nf1 = NumberField.forTesting(f1, new PropertyBackedValueAdapter(props, f1.getId()));
145        final NumberField nf2 = NumberField.forTesting(f2, new PropertyBackedValueAdapter(props, f2.getId()));
146
147        assertEquals(4L, nf1.getNumberValue().longValue());
148        assertEquals(8L, nf2.getNumberValue().longValue());
149        assertEquals(value, nf1.getValue());
150        assertEquals(value, nf2.getValue());
151
152        nf1.increment();
153        assertEquals(5L, nf1.getNumberValue().longValue());
154        assertEquals(8L, nf2.getNumberValue().longValue());
155        assertEquals("5.8", nf1.getValue());
156        assertEquals("5.8", nf2.getValue());
157
158        nf2.increment();
159        assertEquals(5L, nf1.getNumberValue().longValue());
160        assertEquals(9L, nf2.getNumberValue().longValue());
161        assertEquals("5.9", nf1.getValue());
162        assertEquals("5.9", nf2.getValue());
163    }
164
165    @Test
166    public void testDoubleIncrement() {
167        final NumberDefinition f1 = numberDefinition("hello");
168        setFieldNumber(f1, 0);
169        final NumberDefinition f2 = numberDefinition("hello");
170        setFieldNumber(f2, 0);
171        f1.check();
172        f2.check();
173
174        final String value = "4.8";
175
176        final Properties props = new Properties();
177        props.setProperty("hello", value);
178
179        final NumberField nf1 = NumberField.forTesting(f1, new PropertyBackedValueAdapter(props, f1.getId()));
180        final NumberField nf2 = NumberField.forTesting(f2, new PropertyBackedValueAdapter(props, f2.getId()));
181
182        assertEquals(4L, nf1.getNumberValue().longValue());
183        assertEquals(4L, nf2.getNumberValue().longValue());
184        assertEquals(value, nf1.getValue());
185        assertEquals(value, nf2.getValue());
186
187        nf1.increment();
188        assertEquals(5L, nf1.getNumberValue().longValue());
189        assertEquals(5L, nf2.getNumberValue().longValue());
190        assertEquals("5.8", nf1.getValue());
191        assertEquals("5.8", nf2.getValue());
192
193        nf2.increment();
194        assertEquals(6L, nf1.getNumberValue().longValue());
195        assertEquals(6L, nf2.getNumberValue().longValue());
196        assertEquals("6.8", nf1.getValue());
197        assertEquals("6.8", nf2.getValue());
198    }
199}
200
